In many occasions, here I took with the K. I want to keep my Q on the white squares, to be able to get quickly in front of the opp. K. I didn't get a clear idea on which is better, but here I played conventionally...
I gave up the attack on the b7 pawn. It is defendable, and I want to go for the K.

Now, I realize too late that I will have to manage a way to avoid the pawn's chain to be formed in front of his K. I'll have to sac a piece.
